text: @cspan @GOPLeader Yes the Coronavirus is the most pressing issue besides BLM as with Coronavirus over 125,000 and rising are dead with close to 3 million infected everywhere. People are starving and some employers said work from home, then fired them by a letter. Stop being so insidious!
